entry.data:
CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH 10 TO 15 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS AROUND 60
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
WINDY WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING

CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLOUDY

MOSTLY SUNNY
